mapper.sql: id AS "id", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", m_unit AS "mUnit", material_state AS "materialState", storage_state AS "storageState", storage_address AS "storageAddress", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime",pur_number AS "purNumber"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_material_tool where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialState},'%')
and storage_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageState},'%')
and storage_address like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageAddress},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and pur_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purNumber},'%')

select
from wms_material_tool where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialState},'%')
and storage_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageState},'%')
and storage_address like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageAddress},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and pur_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purNumber},'%')

SELECT wms_material_tool.id AS "id", wms_material_tool.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_material_tool.material_type AS "materialType", wms_material_tool.material_name AS "materialName", wms_material_tool.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_material_tool.material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", wms_material_tool.m_unit AS "mUnit", material_state AS "materialState", wms_material_tool.storage_state AS "storageState", wms_material_tool.storage_address AS "storageAddress", wms_material_tool.data_state AS "dataState", wms_material_tool.create_time AS "createTime", wms_material_tool.pur_number AS "purNumber", wms_material_type.plant AS "plant", wms_material_type.di_batchNo AS "diBatchNo", wms_material_type.sizes from wms_material_tool LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_material_tool.material_type_id=wms_material_type.id where 1 = 1
and wms_material_tool.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and wms_material_tool.material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and wms_material_tool.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wms_material_tool.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_material_tool.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_material_tool.material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and wms_material_tool.m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and wms_material_tool.material_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialState},'%')
and wms_material_tool.storage_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageState},'%')
and wms_material_tool.storage_address like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageAddress},'%')
and wms_material_tool.data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and wms_material_tool.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and wms_material_tool.pur_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purNumber},'%')
and wms_material_type.plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and wms_material_type.di_batchNo like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diBatchNo},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
order by id desc

select
from wms_material_tool where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialState},'%')
and storage_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageState},'%')
and storage_address like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageAddress},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and pur_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purNumber},'%')
